analysis.description:
LuckyNumberImp.checkNumber (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- pendingNumbers[_requestor].renderedNumber == 0 && pendingNumbers[_requestor].waitTime > 0

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#99-100:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#53-59) should be declared external
Mortal.kill (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#62-66) should be declared external
LuckyNumberImp.revealNumber (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#264-269) should be declared external
LuckyNumber.revealNumber (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#141-144) should be declared external

LuckyNumberImp.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#220-225) should be declared external
LuckyNumberImp.canReveal (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#290-297) should be declared external
LuckyNumberImp.getNumber (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#339-346) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/30/0x75e494f8a92ad1daa4fd6e78cbac33f84c2f25b9.sol#1): it allows old versions
